languages.text: {n}В воксе слышна стрельба и чьи-то предсмертные вопли. Эфир прорезает невозмутимый голос Соломона:{/n} "ДК-1 на связи, прием".
{n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is DX-1, receiving."
languages.original_text: {n}В воксе слышна стрельба и чьи-то предсмертные вопли. Эфир прорезает невозмутимый голос Соломона:{/n} "ДК-1 на связи, прием".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox transmits gunfire and death screams. Then you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is SA-80, receiving."
{n}The vox transmits gunfire and death screams. Then you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is SA-80, receiving."
{n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is SA-80, receiving."
{n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is SA-80, receiving."
{n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is DX-1, receiving."
{n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is DX-1, receiving."

languages.text: {n}El voco transmite ruidos de disparos y gritos agónicos. Después, oyes la voz tranquila de Solomorne:{/n} «Aquí DX-1, recibido».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is DX-1, receiving."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco transmite ruidos de disparos y gritos agónicos. Después, oyes la voz tranquila de Solomorne:{/n} «Aquí SA-80, recibido».

languages.text: {n}音阵装置中传来了枪声与临死前的惨叫声。随后，你听到了索罗蒙平静的声音。{/n}“这里是DX-1，请讲。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is DX-1, receiving."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置中传来了枪声与临死前的惨叫声。随后，你听到了索罗蒙平静的声音。{/n}“这里是SA-80，请讲。”

languages.text: {n}Du vox s'élèvent des bruits de fusillades et des hurlements d'agonie. Puis, vous entendez la voix calme de Solomorne :{/n} « Ici DX-1. À vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is DX-1, receiving."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du vox s'élèvent des bruits de fusillades et des hurlements d'agonie. Puis, vous entendez la voix calme de Solomorne :{/n} « Ici SA-80. À vous. »

languages.text: {n}ヴォックスから銃声と断末魔の叫びの音が聞こえる。そして、あなたはソロモーンの落ち着いた声を聞く。{/n}「こちらはDX-1、了解しました」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is DX-1, receiving."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォックスから銃声と断末魔の叫びの音が聞こえる。そして、あなたはソロモーンの落ち着いた声を聞く。{/n}「こちらはSA-80、了解しました」

languages.text: {n}Vokstan, atış sesleri ve ölüm çığlıkları geliyor. Ardından Solomorne'un sakin sesi duyuluyor.{/n} "DX-1 konuşuyor. Dinlemedeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is DX-1, receiving."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vokstan, atış sesleri ve ölüm çığlıkları geliyor. Ardından Solomorne'un sakin sesi duyuluyor.{/n} "SA-80 konuşuyor. Dinlemedeyim."

languages.text: {n}Das Vox überträgt Schussgeräusche und Todesschreie. Dann hörst du Solomornes ruhige Stimme:{/n} "Hier DX-1, verstanden."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox transmits the sounds of gunfire and death screams. Then, you hear Solomorne's calm voice:{/n} "This is DX-1, receiving."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox überträgt Schussgeräusche und Todesschreie. Dann hörst du Solomornes ruhige Stimme:{/n} "Hier SA-80, verstanden."
